GSD.description:
PM: core: keep irq flags in device_pm_check_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit 3ec80d52b9b74b9e691997632a543c73eddfeba0. For more details please see the references link.
